title: Kick Ass 2 2013 WEBRiP SUBS AC3 XViD - JUSTiCE
description:
Kick Ass 2 2013 WEBRiP SUBS AC3 XViD - JUSTiCE



SOURCE : VIDEO - smy THXS AUDIO - smy THXS


Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
Check sample and see.....

Ok took the 720p ...changed the contrast and brightness levels.tweaked the rgb colours before adding some sharpness.
Opted not to crop/blur as the subs are just too big.
Audio is great / video looks better than it is ...when viewing in apps and seeing frame by frame,you can see some pixel break up
issues.....however saying that this is STILL more than watchable.
